tours.title: With Dr. Ahmet Anapalı - Ottoman Capitals: Bursa & Söğüt
tours.summary: Following in the footsteps of sultans, departing from Düsseldorf, a unique 6-day journey filled with history and spirituality.

itinerary.title: Lands of Foundation
itinerary.description: Arrival at Istanbul with PC 1006 at 07:30. Transfer to Söğüt, visit Ertuğrul Gazi shrine and proceed to Bursa.

itinerary.title: Great City Bursa
itinerary.description: Osman Gazi, Orhan Gazi, Green Mausoleum, Grand Mosque, Panorama 1326 and Emir Sultan.

itinerary.title: Constantinople Istanbul
itinerary.description: Yedikule, Panorama 1453, Topkapi Palace and Hagia Sophia the Great.

itinerary.title: Sultans' Istanbul
itinerary.description: Abdülhamid II, Süleymaniye, Fatih Mosque, Eyüp Sultan and the Coronation Road.

itinerary.title: Palaces and the Strait
itinerary.description: Dolmabahçe Palace, Barbaros Hayreddin Pasha and Yıldız Palace.

itinerary.title: Farewell
itinerary.description: After free time, airport transfer. Return to Düsseldorf with PC 1005 at 17:35.

tours.title: In the Footsteps of Architect Sinan: Edirne & Istanbul
tours.summary: A journey in the shadow of Edirne, the gateway of the Ottoman Empire to Europe, and Selimiye, the masterpiece of Architect Sinan.

itinerary.title: Journey to the Border City
itinerary.description: Welcome at Istanbul Airport and travel to Edirne by special vehicle. Hotel check-in and tea by the Meriç River in the evening.

itinerary.title: Architect Sinan's Mastery
itinerary.description: Visit the pinnacle of world architectural history - Selimiye Mosque, Üç Şerefeli Mosque and the famous Eski Mosque. Famous Edirne liver served at lunch.

itinerary.title: History of Healing and Karaağaç
itinerary.description: European Council award-winning Bayezid II Health Museum (Darüşşifa), Lausanne Monument and Karaağaç Train Station visit.

itinerary.title: Return to Istanbul and Eyüp Sultan
itinerary.description: Return to Istanbul after breakfast. Visit Eyüp Sultan and enjoy the Golden Horn view from Pierre Loti hill.

itinerary.title: Pearls of the Strait and Farewell
itinerary.description: Boat tour of the Bosphorus, visit to Ortaköy and Egyptian Bazaar in Eminönü, then transfer to airport.

tours.title: In the Shadow of the Night Journey: Holy Jerusalem
tours.summary: Friday prayer at Al-Aqsa Mosque, our first Qibla, and spiritual revival in the City of Prophets.

itinerary.title: Arrival in the Holy Land
itinerary.description: Arrival at Tel Aviv Airport and transfer to Jerusalem. First prayer at Al-Aqsa Mosque and visit to the Western Wall.

itinerary.title: City of Prophets
itinerary.description: View of Jerusalem from Mount of Olives, visit to Salman al-Farisi and Rabia al-Adawiyya sites. Evening gathering at Al-Aqsa Mosque.

itinerary.title: Hebron and Prophet Ibrahim
itinerary.description: Journey to Hebron. Visit tombs of Prophet Ibrahim, Prophet Isaac, Prophet Jacob and their wives. Visit to Bethlehem.

itinerary.title: Old City and Friday Prayer
itinerary.description: Tour of the Old City of Jerusalem, Church of the Holy Sepulchre, Mosque of Umar. Friday prayer in Al-Aqsa Mosque courtyard.

itinerary.title: Jaffa and Return
itinerary.description: Visit Ottoman heritage city of Jaffa, Sultan Abdülhamid Clock Tower and Bahriye Mosque, then transfer to airport.
